creator: gonzalo.garrone@gmail.com
text:
I'm trying to integrate bugzilla with cruisecontrol and I find the disadvantage of reading XML cruisecontrol to impact them in the bugzilla database.
I need a reading of logs in XML format and insert them in the bugzilla database. I appreciate any help.
You can perform this integration or simply incompatible products?.
thank you very much

creator: covener@gmail.com
text: Not a bug, and nothing to do with Apache HTTP Server.
